data.event: Founded in 1923, the neighborhood has been the filming location or setting for television shows.

The 2000 U.S. census counted 7,691 residents in the 6.37-square-mile (16.5 km2) Bel Air neighborhood; with 1,207 per square mile (466/km2) it has among the lowest population densities for the city and the county.
In 2008, the city estimated that the population had increased to 8,253.
